scripts.build-complete: rm -rf extension_out && cp -r extension extension_out && cp -r out/. extension_out/ && grep -rl '/_next' extension_out | xargs sed -i 's|/_next|/next|g'
scripts.build: npm run next-build && npm run build-clear && npm run build-copy && npm run build-copy2 && npm run build-rename && npm run build-complete && npm run build-rename2
scripts.build-fast: npm run build-clear && npm run build-copy && npm run build-copy2 && npm run build-rename && npm run build-complete && npm run build-rename2
